title: Get a Killer Workout at Work?!
description:
It’s Team Secret Santa time again, and this year’s gifts are as bad as ever! Plus, how to get a workout at the office or while traveling, and emails about post-pregnancy weight loss and working out while nursing.

Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ

Check out Jillian’s YouTube channel at https://www.youtube.com/user/JillianMichaels


This Week’s Sponsors:

RITUAL.com/JILLIAN for 10% off during your first 3 months

BLUEAPRON.com/JILLIAN for $60 off

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
